titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Pictures Documenting Men's Ice Hockey
Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Pictures Documenting Men's Ice Hockey
titlestmt.author: compiled by staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:38

did.unittitle: Department of Athletics, Yale University, motion pictures documenting men's ice hockey

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of motion picture films and videotapes documenting men's ice hockey at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-B (YRG 38-B), Records documenting specific sports at Yale.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the Department of Athletics, 2004-2007.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original motion picture films and videotapes may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies. If a use copy does not exist for a particular item, researchers should consult a reference archivist for policies and procedures governing the creation of use copies.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Pictures Documenting Men's Ice Hockey (RU 969). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of motion picture films and videotapes documenting men's ice hockey at Yale.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Arranged chronologically by season. All films are black and white, silent. Films #6-9 are short one reels, possibly of Tot Farrel. Films beginning in 1966 are sound film but can't confirm sound.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Contact Public Services (phone: 203 432-1735, e-mail: mssa.reference@yale.edu) for information on accessing this digital object.

did.unittitle: University Club of Boston & St. Nick's Hockey Club

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Contact Public Services (phone: 203 432-1735, e-mail: mssa.reference@yale.edu) for information on accessing this digital object.

did.unittitle: Highlight footage of Bob Brooke '83, Minnesota North Stars versus Montreal Canadians

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes footage of Yale player introductions. Original tape lists dates of 1931 and 1938. Includes inadvertent home movie baby footage.

did.unittitle: Vermont (Mac Sports Films & Videos, Waterbury, VT)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Content of tapes overlap. Tape 1 includes introduction through the second period. tape 2 begins in the middle of the first period and continues until the end of the game.

did.unittitle: Footage of NHL player Randy Wood (James Sportsfilm Services), videotape (1")
